heading:
Waiver of application, permit and inspection fees for certain work arising out of the storm that occurred on
October 29 and 30, 2012
text:
The commissioner shall waive the fees that would otherwise be required to be paid by this code, the
electrical code or the rules of the department for applications, permits and inspections for certain work arising out of the storm that
occurred on October 29 and 30, 2012 as provided in subsections 28-112.10.1 and 28-112.10.2.
